issues.description: Comment references REQ-GROUP-016 and REQ-GROUP-017 but these PRD requirements actually refer to group permanence and group visibility, not device/nickname uniqueness. The constraints are correct per REQ-GROUP-012 (unique nicknames) and REQ-GROUP-013/14/15 (device binding), but comments cite wrong requirement numbers.

Comment for CurrentProgress references REQ-GOAL-011 and IsCompleted references REQ-GOAL-014, but these requirements don't exist in the PRD. Should reference REQ-GOAL-004 (progress only increases) and REQ-GOAL-006 (progress persisted).

Comments reference REQ-AI-010 for OffTopicWarningCount, REQ-AI-012 for LastActivityAt, and REQ-AI-013 for JoinedAt. Correct references should be REQ-AI-007/REQ-AI-010 for off-topic handling and REQ-AI-009 for inactivity timeout.
Comment references REQ-AI-018 which doesn't exist in the PRD. Should reference REQ-DASH-010 (resolved alerts can re-trigger).

Comments reference REQ-GROUP-016 and REQ-GROUP-017 but these requirements in the PRD refer to group permanence and group listing visibility respectively. The uniqueness constraints are correct but comments cite wrong requirement numbers.

buildOutput: Build could not be executed: dotnet SDK is not installed on this system. The 'dotnet' command was not found in PATH or common installation directories (/usr/local/share/dotnet, /opt/homebrew/bin, ~/.dotnet). The code structure and syntax appear correct based on manual review.
